headline: Bernstein says U.S. gas supercycle is coming
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein analysts are forecasting the onset of a U.S. natural gas supercycle, driven by a combination of robust demand growth and constrained supply. In a detailed sector outlook, Bernstein projects that total U.S. gas demand will rise from approximately 120 billion cubic feet per day (bcfd) in 2024 to about 148 bcfd by 2030.
